Details: What it is: A rich yet weightless conditioner that repairs and smooths for healthy hair that’s twice as strongin the cult fave Brazilian Bum Bum Cream scent. Hair Type: Straight, Wavy, and Curly Hair Texture: Fine, Medium, and Thick Key Benefits: Reduces Frizz and Minimizes Damage Formulation: Lightweight Cream Highlighted Ingredients: - SOL Seal Technology™: With plant-based keratin beads that target hair damage and integrate into hair’s natural structure to restore, repair, and fuse together split ends.- Brazil Nut Selenium: Rich in omega-3 fatty acids and vitamin E to nurture, strengthen, and provide superior moisture benefits while protecting against frizz.- Buriti Oil: Rich in healthy fats to deeply condition and smooth dry, damaged hair while bringing vital shine to dull faded hair. Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, and triclocarban. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free, and comes in recyclable packaging. What Else You Need to Know: Brazilian Joia™ shampoo and conditioner help mend and prevent breakage for strong, damage-free hair. With encapsulated plant-based keratin beads, SOL Seal Technology™ instantly smooths and helps repair split ends. Frizz-fighting. Shine-boosting. Color-safe. Made with Brazilian Hair Expertise for dramatic results.Clinical Results:  Compared to control when shampoo and conditioner are used together; testing was conducted by an independent 3rd party lab:- Hair is 2 times stronger- 54% reduction in breakage- 74% of split ends mended
Ingredients:
-SOL Seal Technology™: With plant-based keratin beads that target hair damage and integrate into hair’s natural structure to restore, repair, and fuse together split ends.
-Brazil Nut Selenium: Rich in omega-3 fatty acids and vitamin E to nurture, strengthen, and provide superior moisture benefits while protecting against frizz.
-Buriti Oil: Rich in healthy fats to deeply condition and smooth dry, damaged hair while bringing vital shine to dull faded hair.

If you want to know more…How blonde keeps its cool. Ultra-violet, brass-busting formulas let hair stay bright and light. Amika Bust Your Brass Cool Blonde Conditioner delivers bright and shiny, cool-toned resultsperfect for blonde, silver, and gray color hair, whether natural or enhanced. 
What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- Phthalates
What else you need to know: This product is formulated without MIT/MCI, artificial colors, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, triclocarban, aluminum, talc, and have less than one percent synthetic fragrances. 
Sea buckthorn berry (also known as obliphica) is included in all of Amika’s haircare and styling products. It contains over 190 biologically active compounds, including vitamin C (15 times more than an orange), vitamin A (three times more than a carrot), and vitamin E. It also has high concentrations of the rare omega-7, making up 40 percent of the berry. Typically only found in fish oil, omega-7 keeps free radicals at bay and promotes the production of collagen, a key building block for skin, hair, and nails. 
Sea buckthorn has been thoroughly researched in over 130 modern scientific studies that have found that this berry promotes health. Women throughout the ages have used the obliphica berry to protect themselves against the ravages of the sun and the elements. Founded on tradition and now based on extensive scientific research, sea buckthorn is one of the biggest functional whole food rediscoveries of the 21st century.
Ingredients:
-Shea Butter: Extracted from the nuts of African Shea Tree, shea butter is full of vitamins, minerals, and five fatty acids which penetrate hair’s cuticle and provide deep nourishment, softness, and shine.   
-Tocopheryl: A special type of vitamin E which can penetrate the lipid manual and provide antioxidant effects; unlike normal vitamin E, tocopheryl does not break down quickly and provides extended protection from oxidation. -Hydrolyzed Keratin: Keratin that has been broken down small enough to penetrate regions of porosity and damage in and on the hair cuticle; repairs and restores moisture, elasticity, luster, and smoothness. -Sea Buckthorn Berry (the Super Fruit): Naturally contains over 190 biologically active compounds including vitamin E.Water, Propylene Glycol, Myristyl Alcohol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Phenoxyethanol, Cetearyl Alcohol, PEG-3 Distearoylamidoethylmonium Methosulfate, Polysorbate 60, Decyl Oleate, Fragrance, Violet External 2 (CI 60730), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Chlorhexidine Dihydrochloride, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Hydrolyzed Keratin.

Details:
Which hair type is it good for?

What it is:
 A dual-action conditioner that visually enhances hair volume and promotes long-term growth. 
Key benefits:
- Creates fuller-looking hair
- Encourages long-term follicle growth
- Promotes softness with no sticky residue
If you want to know more…
 Blossom & Bloom™ Ginseng + Biotin Volumizing Conditioner utilizes natural volumizing agents to promote fuller, thicker-looking hair from the inside out. Natural sugar derivative maltodextrin coats and increases the diameter of each strand, creating the appearance of more voluminous hair. Ginseng and biotin help stimulate blood flow to the scalp, promoting long-term growth of new follicles. Contrary to most volumizing products, this non-alcohol formula harnesses the power of 95 percent naturally derived ingredients to visibly thicken hairsans the drying, sticky, or stiff after-effects that can dull and damage tresses over time.  




What else you need to know:
 This product is free of silicones, artificial fragrances, and artificial dyes. It is vegan-friendly and cruelty-free.

The Briogeo brand was inspired by a family tradition of making natural beauty products at home in the kitchen of founder Nancy Twine. Nancy believes the answer to beautiful, healthy, and charismatic hair exists within nature's own ingredients.
Clean at SephoraClean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients, including sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, phthalates, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.
Ingredients:
-Maltodextrin: Coats each strand to increase its diameter and enhances the appearance of fuller hair with no sticky or stiff after-effects. 
-Biotin: Promotes hair growth and aids in overall health by strengthening each strand’s follicle and shaft.       
-Ginseng: Stimulates blood flow to the scalp and follicles to encourage hair growth through a natural extract.
-Ginger Root: Delivers stimulating properties to the scalp and follicle to encourage hair growth.

Which hair type is it good for?

✔ Curly

What it is:
 An ultra-hydrating conditioner designed to nourish, define, and de-frizz hair with a more dry, harder-to-tame texture. 
Key benefits:
- Hydrates dry locks
- Defines and texturizes curls
- Eliminates flyaways
If you want to know more…
 Curl Charisma™ Rice Amino + Shea Curl Defining Conditioner is specially formulated to defrizz, define, and moisturize curls for hair that pops. Fortified with rice amino acids, it penetrates the shaft to effectively lock out frizz-causing environmental moisture. Tomato fruit ferment and mollis leaf extract seal the cuticle to ensure tresses dry consistently for uniform curl formation, while ultra-hydrating shea butter and sweet almond oils enhance the softness and body of the hair without weighing it down. A little goes a long way with this easy-to-apply, thick, and concentrated formula, which doubles as a do-it-yourself curl refresher. Locks are left feeling soft and manageable with incredible curlsdefined, and sleek, and beautiful. 




What else you need to know:
 This product is formulated without silicones, gluten, DEA, and artificial dyes. It is cruelty-free, color-safe, and safe for use on chemically-treated, relaxed, and keratin-treated hair. Its formula is packaged in a fully-recyclable, eco-friendly container made of 25 percent recycled plastic. 

The Briogeo brand was inspired by a family tradition of making natural beauty products at home in the kitchen of founder Nancy Twine. Nancy believes the answer to beautiful, healthy, and charismatic hair exists within nature's own ingredients.
Clean at SephoraClean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients, including sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, phthalates, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.

-Rice Amino Acids: Seal the hair cuticle to lock out frizz-inducing environmental moisture. 
-Mollis Leaf Extract and Tomato Fruit Ferment: Seal the cuticle for consistent curl formation and enhanced definition.
-Shea Butter: Softens and hydrates curls with antioxidant-rich moisturizing agents.  
-Almond Oil: Enhances shine, softness, and texture of curls.

Sea buckthorn berry, also known as obliphica, is included in all of amika’s haircare and styling products. It contains over 190 biologically active compounds, including vitamin C (15 times more than an orange), vitamin A (three times more than a carrot), and vitamin E. It also has high concentrations of the rare omega-7, making up 40 percent of the berry. Typically, only found in fish oil, omega-7 keeps free radicals at bay and supports natural collagen, a key building block for skin, hair, and nails.

 Unlike many traditional shampoos, the non-lathering Be Gentle, Be Kind™ Avocado + Quinoa Co—Wash is so hydrating, you typically won’t need to follow up with a conditioner. The formula’s high-slip nature makes for easy detangling and manageability, creating hair that feels soft, hydrated, and tangle-free. It is recommended for those with textured, thick, coarse, curly, or dry hair, and even helps to extend color—nourishing chemically-treated, relaxed, or keratin-treated hair. Hair that’s thick is typically on the dryer side of the spectrum, which tends to mean hair oils don’t spread as intensely through the hair shaft as with thinner or finer hair. Contrary to sudsing shampoos—which can cause higher levels of oil loss—this super-creamy cleanser leaves hair looking luxuriously quenched. 




What else you need to know:
 This product is free of silicones, gluten, artificial fragrances, and artificial dyes. It is also vegan-friendly, cruelty-free, and contains 91 percent naturally-derived ingredients.

The Briogeo brand was inspired by a family tradition of making natural beauty products at home in the kitchen of founder Nancy Twine. Nancy believes the answer to beautiful, healthy, and charismatic hair exists within nature's own ingredients.
Clean at SephoraClean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients, including sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, phthalates, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.

-Coconut Oil: Seals in moisture to protect tresses from breakage and excessive heat exposure.
-Vitamin E: Softens strands, provides essential healthy-hair nutrients, and helps prevent breakage.

Details: What it is:A rich, moisturizing, color-preserving conditioner designed to seal, shine, and keep tones true.What it does:This invigorating conditioner hydrates, softens, and detangles while also helping to prevent color fading and washout. By locking color in and locking water out, you can keep hues as rich as the day of your service. Designed to treat dry or processed hair, Color Minded seals in shine and smooths the cuticle to make hair color glow, fights the horrid humidity, and adds healthy-looking luster and luminosityjust like a finishing coat.What it is formulated without- Parabens- Phthalates What else you need to know:Formulated with a new, proprietary two-polymer technology that covalently binds to and cross-links over color-treated hair, this color-preserving complex works to resurface the process-damaged cuticle and seal the hair to prevent color washout and fading. The color process opens the cuticle to deposit color into the hair shaft. If the cuticle is not sealed properly, water can enter and wash away new color as soon as the first shampoo (which is when the most color washout happens).Bumble and bumble is a cruelty-free brand, meaning they don't test on animals. Bb. products are free from parabens, phthalates, mineral oils, and formaldehyde.

Sea buckthorn berry (also known as obliphica) is included in all of Amika’s haircare and styling products. It contains over 190 biologically active compounds, including vitamin C (15 times more than an orange), vitamin A (three times more than a carrot), and vitamin E. It also has high concentrations of the rare omega-7, making up 40 percent of the berry. Typically only found in fish oil, omega-7 keeps free radicals at bay and promotes the production of collagen, a key building block for skin, hair, and nails. 
Sea buckthorn has been thoroughly researched in over 130 modern scientific studies that have found that this berry promotes health. Women throughout the ages have used the obliphica berry to protect themselves against the ravages of the sun and the elements. Founded on tradition and now based on extensive scientific research, sea buckthorn is one of the biggest functional whole food rediscoveries of the 21st century.
Ingredients: -Hydrolyzed Keratin: Repairs and restores moisture, elasticity, luster, and smoothness.-Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein: Increases the hair’s ability to retain moisture for revitalized, shiny hair with improved manageability.-Shea Butter: Revitalizes, smooths, and softens, damaged hair.-Sea Buckthorn Berry: Naturally contains over 190 biologically active compounds including vitamin E, vitamin A, and vitamin C. Water, Myristyl Alcohol, Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Decyl Oleate, Trimethylsiloxyamodimethicone, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, C11-15 Pareth-7, C12-16 Pareth-9, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Glycerin, Trideceth-12, Fragrance/Parfum, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sorbic Acid.

Details: Which hair type is it good for?✔ Straight✔ Wavy✔ Curly✔ Coiled✔  Tightly CoiledWhat it is:A dry conditioner that weightlessly smooths, detangles, and restores softness and shine without water.Key benefits:- Weightlessly conditions and smooths hair- Detangles and restores softness and shine- Instantly eliminates staticIf you want to know more…Silken Up Dry Conditioner weightlessly conditions tresses with an antioxidant-packed, dry formulation that won’t dampen a style. This product restores the look of a glossy sheen, reduces static, and detangles hair. Use it on clean hair for a lightweight nourishment and silkiness or use on second day hair for a freshly washed look and feel. A perfect partner to Perk Up Dry Shampoo (sold separately), use Silken Up Dry Conditioner to lightly condition the lengths of hair and Perk Up Dry Shampoo (sold separately) to absorb excess oil and add volume at the root. This dynamic duo delivers the ultimate freshly washed look and feel.What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know:This product is certified vegan and formulated without MIT/MCI, artificial colors, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, triclocarban, aluminum, talc, and have less than one percent synthetic fragrances. It is safe for color-treated, Brazilian-treated, and keratin-treated hair. Sea buckthorn berry (also known as obliphica) is included in all of Amika’s haircare and styling products. It contains over 190 biologically active compounds, including vitamin C (15 times more than an orange), vitamin A (three times more than a carrot), and vitamin E. It also has high concentrations of the rare omega-7, making up 40 percent of the berry. Typically only found in fish oil, omega-7 keeps free radicals at bay and promotes the production of collagen, a key building block for skin, hair, and nails. Sea buckthorn has been thoroughly researched in over 130 modern scientific studies that have found that this berry promotes health. Women throughout the ages have used the obliphica berry to protect themselves against the ravages of the sun and the elements. Founded on tradition and now based on extensive scientific research, sea buckthorn is one of the biggest functional whole food rediscoveries of the 21st century.
Ingredients: -Panthenol: Promotes and restores hair’s resilience, protecting against breakage, strengthening, smoothing, and reducing split ends.-Dimethicone: Prevents moisture loss and forms a barrier on hair that smooths down the cuticle, providing excellent anti-frizz benefits.-Sea Buckthorn Berry (Obliphica): Protects, hydrates, and nourishes hair.Butane, Alcohol Denat., Propane, Diisopropyl Adipate, Butylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetrimonium Methosulfate, Quaternium-91, PEG-8 Dimethicone, Fragrance, Water, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn/Argousier) Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Panthenol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Citronellol.

A paraben-free conditioner that builds volume, adds weightless moisture, and improves the overall appearance of fine, thin hair. 

What it is formulated to do:
This gentle conditioner reduces hair breakage while nourishing strands and adding volume with weightless moisture. The secret is the Marine Plumping Complex, which contains omega-3 and Seasilk® to strengthen and restore hair’s natural thickness, and reduce breakage. Color Hold®, a proprietary technology, locks in hair color brightness.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
 This product is also free of synthetic color, DEA/TEA,  and petrochemicals, and is suited for color-treated hair. It is part of the first luxury hair care collection inspired by skin-plumping technology for supremely voluminous hair. 

Research results:
In a consumer test of 30 women who used the CAVIAR Anti-Aging Bodybuilding Volume Shampoo, CAVIAR Anti-Aging Bodybuilding Volume Conditioner, and CAVIAR Anti-Aging Miracle Multiplying Volume Mist (each sold separately) over the course of two weeks:
- 89% said the more they used, the more their hair looked multiplied
Ingredients:
-Caviar Extract: Contains amino acids and omega-3 fatty acids that help smooth the hair shaft and increase shine.
-Seasilk® (A blend of marine botanicals): Provides exceptional moisture.
-A blend of Keratin, Panthenol, and Biotin: Strengthens, fortifies, and reinforces to support weak and fragile hair strands.
-Color Hold® (A proprietary technology): Locks in hair color brightness.

What it is:A lightweight, detangling leave-in conditioner formulated with UV filters for color protection.   
Key benefits:
- Keeps hair color vibrant and hydrated
- UV filters protect hair against sun damage and color fading
- Amino acids restore shine and smoothness
If you want to know more…Put color and vibrancy on lock. This lightweight spray mist effortlessly detangles and softens, while UV filters and antioxidants keep natural and enhanced color protected and vibrant. It strengthens and smoothsboosting hair’s elasticity and restoring shine.   
What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- Phthalates
What else you need to know:Sea buckthorn berry (also known as obliphica) is included in all of Amika’s haircare and styling products. It contains over 190 biologically active compounds, including vitamin C (15 times more than an orange), vitamin A (three times more than a carrot), and vitamin E. It also has high concentrations of the rare omega-7, making up 40 percent of the berry. Typically only found in fish oil, omega-7 keeps free radicals at bay and promotes the production of collagen, a key building block for skin, hair, and nails. Sea buckthorn has been thoroughly researched in over 130 modern scientific studies that have found that this berry promotes health. Women throughout the ages have used the obliphica berry to protect themselves against the ravages of the sun and the elements. Founded on tradition and now based on extensive scientific research, sea buckthorn is one of the biggest functional whole food rediscoveries of the 21st century.
Ingredients:
-Amino Acid Complex: Strengthens the hair shaft, smooths the cuticle, boosts hair elasticity, and keeps colors vibrant on dyed hair.  
-Cinnamidopropyltrimonium Chloride: Patented UV absorber that is small enough to penetrate the hair, allowing it to protect both the cuticle and the cortex from UV-B damage; proven to preserve the natural and synthetic color of the hair and fight against the sun that can fade color.  
-Sea Buckthorn Berry (Obliphica): Protects, hydrates, and nourishes hair. The no-lather formula gently cleanses while delivering lightweight moisture. Ideal for dry, coarse, curly, or color-treated hair, you can say good-bye to dull, dry hair and hello to softness and moisture. Deeply cleanse and condition hair with a two-step shampoo and conditioner at least once a week to remove all impurities, buildup and scalp residue. What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know: This product is certified vegan and formulated without MIT/MCI, artificial colors, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, triclosan, triclocarban, aluminum, talc, and have less than one percent synthetic fragrances. It is safe for color-treated, Brazilian-treated, and keratin-treated hair.Sea buckthorn berry (also known as obliphica) is included in all of Amika’s haircare and styling products. It contains over 190 biologically active compounds, including vitamin C (15 times more than an orange), vitamin A (three times more than a carrot), and vitamin E. It also has high concentrations of the rare omega-7, making up 40 percent of the berry. Typically only found in fish oil, omega-7 keeps free radicals at bay and promotes the production of collagen, a key building block for skin, hair, and nails. Sea buckthorn has been thoroughly researched in over 130 modern scientific studies that have found that this berry promotes health. Women throughout the ages have used the obliphica berry to protect themselves against the ravages of the sun and the elements. Founded on tradition and now based on extensive scientific research, sea buckthorn is one of the biggest functional whole food rediscoveries of the 21st century.
Ingredients:
-Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil: Derived from grape seeds, the lightweight oil is full of vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants; nourishes hair and delivers shine, softness, silkiness, and prevents frizz; contains UV filters. -Avena Sativa (Oat) Peptide: Extracted from the oat kernel; the peptide that can travel to hair’s cortex to nourish and repair from inside out; forms a protective film on hair which locks in moisture and delivers shine and a silky feel.-Glycine Soja (Soybean) Protein: Derived from soybean amino acids and contains significant amounts of all the essential amino acids, is rich in protein, minerals, and vitamins; gives hair strength and delivers moisture.  
-Sea Buckthorn Berry (Obliphica): Protects, hydrates, and nourishes hair; contains over 190 biologically active compounds, including vitamin C (15 times more than an orange), vitamin A (three times more than a carrot), and vitamin E; has high concentrations of the rare omega 7, making up 40 percent of the berry; keeps free radicals at bay and promotes the production of collagen, a key building block for skin, hair, and nails.  
Water, Cetyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Glycerin, Isopropyl Palmitate, Polyquaternium-7, Laureth-4, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Propylene Glycol, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Avena Sativa (Oat) Peptide, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Protein, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn Seed) Oil, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sorbic Acid, Fragrance, Citric Acid.
